config module

@file config.py @brief Centralized configuration manager for the teleoperation system @details Provides type-safe access to robot configurations with validation

and centralized management of all robot parameters.

class config.Configuration[source]

Bases: object

@brief Configuration manager for robotic arm teleoperation system @details Provides centralized access to robot configurations with

validation and default value handling for all teleoperation modules.

ROBOT_CONFIGS = {'panda': {'arm_joint_count': 7, 'axis_remap': {'pitch': 'pitch', 'roll': 'roll', 'vx': 'vx', 'vy': 'vy', 'vz': 'vz', 'yaw': 'yaw'}, 'end_effector_body': 'hand', 'movement_scales': {'deadzone_threshold': 0.1, 'gripper_close_pos': 0.0, 'gripper_open_pos': 1.0, 'gripper_speed': 1, 'rotation': 0.5, 'tilt': 0.5, 'translation': 0.3}, 'name': 'Franka Emika Panda', 'xml_path': 'franka_emika_panda/panda.xml'}, 'so100': {'arm_joint_count': 5, 'axis_remap': {'pitch': 'yaw', 'roll': 'pitch', 'vx': 'vy', 'vy': 'vz', 'vz': 'vx', 'yaw': 'roll'}, 'end_effector_body': 'Fixed_Jaw', 'joint_multipliers': {'elbow': 1.0, 'pitch': 1.0, 'rotation': 0.005, 'wrist_pitch': 0.02, 'wrist_roll': 0.01}, 'movement_scales': {'deadzone_threshold': 0.1, 'gripper_close_pos': 0.0, 'gripper_open_pos': 0.0123, 'gripper_speed': 1, 'rotation': 0.4, 'tilt': 0.4, 'translation': 0.15}, 'name': 'SO100 Robotic Arm', 'xml_path': 'trs_so_arm100/so_arm100.xml'}, 'ur5': {'arm_joint_count': 6, 'axis_remap': {'pitch': 'pitch', 'roll': 'roll', 'vx': 'vx', 'vy': 'vy', 'vz': 'vz', 'yaw': 'yaw'}, 'end_effector_body': 'robotiq_base', 'movement_scales': {'deadzone_threshold': 0.1, 'gripper_close_pos': 0.0, 'gripper_open_pos': 1.0, 'gripper_speed': 1, 'rotation': 0.3, 'tilt': 0.3, 'translation': 0.2}, 'name': 'UR5e with 2F-85 Gripper', 'xml_path': 'universal_robots_ur5e/ur5e_with_gripper.xml'}}
get_joint_multipliers()[source]

@brief Retrieve joint control multipliers for specified robot

@param robot_name: Name of the robot @return: Dictionary of joint multiplier parameters

@note Returns default values (1.0) if joint_multipliers not defined

get_movement_scales()[source]

@brief Retrieve movement scaling parameters for specified robot

@param robot_name: Name of the robot @return: Dictionary of movement scale parameters

@note Returns default values if movement_scales not defined for robot

get_robot_config()[source]

@brief Retrieve configuration dictionary for specified robot

@param robot_name: Name of the robot configuration to retrieve @return: Copy of the robot configuration dictionary

@throws ValueError: If robot_name is not found in ROBOT_CONFIGS

@note Returns a copy to prevent modification of original configuration
